gameDetails.name: Pillars of Heracles: Epic Expansion
gameDetails.description:
The Epic Expansion adds the following to the base game of Pillars of Heracles: 

     The 5th player expansion (as miniatures)
     The Trading Monopolies expansion: shape powerful trading routes, influence resource markets, and engage in strategic commerce at any player count. This expansion enhances deck-building, adds more depth, complexity, and variability, and ensures that players stay fully engaged, even during other players' turns. 
     Rome city-state tile


—description from the publisher
